title: Amazon Linux 2022 - ALAS2022-2022-205: Important priority package update for python-bottle
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2022 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2022-31799:
	Bottle before 0.12.20 mishandles errors during early request binding.

CVE-2022-3179:
	Weak Password Requirements in GitHub repository ikus060/rdiffweb prior to 2.4.2.
